pasta.service

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.service.UserManager

  • @Service(value="userManager")
@Repository
public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    User manager.

    Manages interaction between controller and data. This class works as an abstraction layer between the controller and the underlying data models. This class contains the majority of the logic code dealing with objects and their interactions.

    Since:
    2014-01-31
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • getOrCreateUser

        public PASTAUser getOrCreateUser(java.lang.String username)
        Get or create the user with a given name.

        Attempt to retrieve the user from UserDAO if it fails, then create a new user. The new user is placed in the tutorial "" and the stream "" with permission level of UserPermissionLevel.STUDENT

        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        the user object

      • giveExtension

        public void giveExtension(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String assessmentName,
                 java.util.Date extension)
        Helper method
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the student getting an extension
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        extension - the new due date for the assessment
        See Also:
        giveExtension(PASTAUser, String, Date)

      • giveExtension

        public void giveExtension(PASTAUser user,
                 java.lang.String assessmentName,
                 java.util.Date extension)
        Give a student an extension to a given date.

        Updates the extensions in the cahced user and writes them to disk in the folder $ProjectLocation$/submissions/$username$/user.extensions using the following format: "$assessmentName$>yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH-mm-ss"

        Parameters:
        user - the user of the student getting an extension
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        extension - the new due date for the assessment

      • updatePassword

        public void updatePassword(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String newPassword)
        Update the password for a given user with a new one.

        Currently uses md5Hex

        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        newPassword - the password in plaintext
